programme.title: Women's Hammer Throw Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Hammer Throw Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 06/08/24. Camryn Rogers (CAN) won the Gold with a distance of 76.97m. Annette Nneka Echikunwoke (USA) won the Silver, and Jie Zhao (CHN), completed the podium,

programme.title: Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final took place at Stade de France, on 06/08/24. Winfred Yavi (BRN) won Gold with an Olympic record time of 8:52.76 minutes. Peruth Chemutai (UGA) won Silver, and Faith Cherotich (KEN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Armand Duplantis: flying high and smashing records | Wait For It Tokyo 2020
programme.desc: Sweden's Armand "Mondo" Duplantis confirmed his status as the best pole vaulter in the world by seizing his first Olympic pole vault title by storm.

programme.title: Elaine Thompson-Hera: One sprint to rule them all | Wait For It Tokyo 2020
programme.desc: How Elaine Thompson-Hera became the undisputed sprinting queen and the first woman to win the 100-200m double gold at consecutive Olympics.

programme.title: Neeraj Chopra: Throws his way into a nation's heart | Wait For It Tokyo 2020
programme.desc: Neeraj Chopra makes Olympic history with the first-ever Olympic gold medal in track-and-field for India.

programme.title: Double Sculls, Fours, Eights, Single Sculls | Rowing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session took place at Nautical St - Flat Water, France, on 01/08/24.
At the Women's Double Sculls Final, Gold was claimed by Team New Zealand, Team Romania won Silver, and the Bronze went to Team Great Britain.
At the Men's Double Sculls Final, Team Romania won Gold, Team Netherlands calimed Silver, and Team Ireland completed the podium, with the Bronze.
At the Women's Four Final, it was Gold for Team Netherlands, Silver for Great Britain, and Bronze for New Zealand.
At the Men's Four Final, Gold was claimed by Team USA, the Silver by Team New Zealand, and the Bronze by Team Great Britain.

programme.title: Meet the Phogats | Wrestling My Family
programme.desc: Mahavir convenes a family lunch to discuss the futures of Dushyant and Sangeeta, urging them to train for the upcoming Paris 2024 Olympics. However, Geeta, who also aspires for a comeback in professional wrestling, feels neglected by Mahavir's focus.

programme.title: Living Up to Expectations | Wrestling My Family
programme.desc: We delve into Geeta's life at the police academy, Babita's role in politics, and Ritu's MMA training in Singapore. Meanwhile, Dushyant and Sangeeta add a touch of fun with Instagram reels.

programme.title: Dushyant’s Time to Shine | Wrestling My Family
programme.desc: Dushyant reconnects with his roots in the family’s native village, spending time with Mahavir and his mother Daya Kaur. Babita pays a surprise visit to Mahavir’s training academy, supervising Dushyant and other students.

programme.title: Life and Love | Wrestling My Family
programme.desc: Explore Bajrang and Sangeeta’s love story, rooted in mutual support and a shared passion for wrestling. Gain insights into how each spouse supports their partner's dreams. Meanwhile, Dushyant and Ritu share their perspectives on relationships.

programme.title: Siblings Bonding | Wrestling My Family
programme.desc: Dushyant's first international trip takes him to Singapore to surprise Ritu, showcasing their sibling bond as they explore the city together and conquer their fear of heights with a bungee jump.

programme.title: Men's 1500m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 1500m Final took place at Stade de France, on 06/08/24. Cole Hocker (USA) won Gold with an Olympic record time 3:27.65 minutes. Josh Kerr (GBR) won Silver, and Yared Nuguse (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's Team QFs/SFs/Finals | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Quarter-Finals, Semi-Finals and Finals for Women's Team Archery took place on 28/07/2024 at Invalides, Paris. The Republic of Korea won Gold, France won Silver, and Turkey won Bronze.

programme.title: Shakti: India’s Super Women
programme.desc: The inspiring stories of four top Indian female athletes who have faced unmatched obstacles in order to triumph at the high levels. Shakti features wrestler Sakshi Malik, gymnast Dipa Karmakar, karateka Sandhya Shetty and archer Deepika Kumari. Watch Now”

programme.title: Men's Team QFs/SFs/Finals | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Quarter-Finals, Semi-Finals and Finals for Men's Team Archery took place on 29/07/2024 at Invalides, Paris. The Republic of Korea won Gold, The People's Republic of China won Silver, and Mexico won Bronze.

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 3
programme.desc: In this episode: hockey tracking systems, tennis gliding shoes, ski helmets for the partially blind, archery technology, and hi-speed cameras for training.

programme.title: Mixed Team Bronze Medal Match IND - USA | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Mixed Team Bronze Medal Match took place at Invalides, Paris, on 02/08/24. United States won the Bronze Medal with a victory over the India 6:2

programme.title: Gamers Vs: Episode 3
programme.desc: Popular Gamers apply their gaming skills to Olympic sports with the help of world-class athletes and international coaches. Watch them trying the sports of Curling, Archery and Table Tennis.

programme.title: Mixed Team Gold Medal Match KOR - GER | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Mixed Team Gold Medal Match took place at Invalides, Paris, on 02/08/24. The Republic of Korea won the Gold Medal with a victory over Germany, who won Silver, 6:0

programme.title: Original Fuel (Film)
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, athletes representing young republics have forged their own path to DIY training and Olympic success.

programme.title: 10m Air Rifle Mixed Team Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 27/07/2024 at the Chateauroux Shooting Range, Paris. CHN claimed the Gold, KOR the Silver and KAZ completed the podium.

programme.title: India’s Abhinav Bindra I Legends Live On
programme.desc: A look at the Olympic achievements of India’s first-ever individual gold medallist, Abhinav Bindra, and how he is now helping others fulfil their dreams.

programme.title: Women's 10m Air Rifle Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 10m Air Rifle Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 29/07/24. Hyojin Ban (KOR) won Gold with a total of 251.8. Yuting Huang (CHN) won Silver, and Audrey Gogniat (SUI) completed the podium.

programme.title: Meet the pistol shooter funding her passion with a career as an engineer
programme.desc: Canada’s Lynda Kiejko is making the most of her career as an engineer to follow in the footsteps of her three-time Olympian father.

programme.title: Men's Trap Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Trap Finals took place on 30/07/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre. Nathan Hales (GBR) won Gold, Qi Ying (CHN) won Silver, and Jean Pierre Brol Cardenas (GUA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Teenage duo Suratwadi & Wiberg have Olympic and Paralympic Games in focus
programme.desc: Hard work and a willingness to learn keep weightlifter Phonnapha Suratwadi and wheelchair racer Ty Wiberg on course for the Games.

programme.title: Men's 50m Rifle 3 Positions Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 50m Rifle 3 Position Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 01/08/24. Yukun Liu (CHN) won Gold with a total of 463.6 points, Serhiy Kulish (UKR) won Silver, and Swapnil Kusale (IND) won Bronze.

programme.title: Original Fuel (Film)
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, athletes representing young republics have forged their own path to DIY training and Olympic success.

programme.title: Men's Skeet Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Shooting Skeet Final was held on 03/08/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre, Paris. Vincent Hancock (USA) claimed the Gold, Conner Lynn Prince (USA) took Silver and Lee Meng Yuan (TPE) completed the podium

programme.title: Anatomy of: Archery, Rhythmic Gymnastics, and Marathon
programme.desc: In a sports science lab, we studied the physiques of archer Atanu Das, rhythmic gymnast Ekaterina Selezneva, and marathon runner Desiree Linden to find out what makes them special at their sports.

programme.title: Men's 25m Rapid Fire Pistol Final | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 25m Rapid Fire Pistol Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 05/08/24. Li Yuehong (CHN) won Gold with a total of 32 points, Cho Yeongjae (KOR) won Silver and Wang Xinjie (CHN) won Bronze.
